page.title: 06CHANGE.
page.content: Over the past few years{Westminster {Rd.}has changed a lot. There used to be a fire station and a police station which served the local community. Now they have been closed down and moved a long way away. The buildings, which are over 100yrs. old, are occupied by workshops and a double glazing firm. We don't have a local police station or fire station any more. All the old {Victorian}terraced houses were knocked down last year. We went to see the big yellow bulldozers picking up mud and digging the foundations. Now there is a new{housing}estate and we have new children in our school.{(Sarah {Windever, Wesley Cartlidge, Emma Ward, {Jill Parry.)
